name: Azory Gwanda
description: Journalist Azory Gwanda disappeared after investigating rural killings. Presumed enforced disappearance.

name: Ben Saanane
description: Political advisor Ben Saanane disappeared under suspicious circumstances.

name: Mdude Nyagali
description: Political activist kidnapped and tortured by unknown persons, later released.

name: Deusdedit Soka
description: Human rights activist disappeared while traveling to Kigoma.
